amendatorysection.catchline: Emery wheels and grindstones; use and operation.
amendatorysection.para: No emery wheels or grindstones in any factory, mill or workshop, shall be used when known to the person using the same to be cracked or otherwise defective, nor operated at a greater speed than indicated or guaranteed by the manufacturer of such emery wheel or grindstone.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV, art. IV, § 6, p. 560;
